'''1.21.122''' is a hotfix to {{BE}} released on November 10, 2025 for Windows and servers,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/40947085632141-Minecraft-1-21-122-Bedrock|title=Minecraft - 1.21.122 (Bedrock)|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=November 10, 2025}}</ref> which fixes some bugs.

== Changes ==
'''[[Achievement]]s'''
* "[[MOAR Tools]]" is now awarded by [[Copper#Gear and tools|copper tools]] correctly instead of being awarded by other items.
* "[[Achievement#You Need a Mint|You Need a Mint]]" is no longer awarded from items other than [[dragon's breath]].

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MCPE|fixedin=1.21.122
|MCPE-230832|Mouse cursor moves in the background during gameplay, disrupting gameplay
}}
